title: The Son of the Werewolf
description: Margaret Gunn, raped by a psycho in a wolf's costume in Return of the Werewolf, gives birth to an unusually ugly child. He grows up to become a loner, a bully and finally a murderer, as he slices up his headteacher at the age of fifteen. While in gaol he discovers he is a werewolf and on his release the murders start again.
author: Guy N. Smith
